noteCreationRules: Daily notes in the Journals/Daily/ directory must use YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 2025-02-27.md). The filename should be the date only, no titles or prefixes.
editingRules: When editing daily notes, preserve the YYYY-MM-DD filename format. Do not rename daily notes.
templateRules: Daily note templates should follow the tpl-daily template structure with proper YAML frontmatter including 'date created' field matching the filename date.
